snippet: New and unlimited reserves of cash from so-called independent groups are bankrolling a constant stream of negative political ads.
abstract: Editorial decries limitless cash that so-called independent super PACs are dumping into attacks ads in Iowa caucuses; contends that these primary ads are just a preview of what lies in store when heavy armament is rolled out for general election; holds that 2012 presidential election is shaping up to be the worst in terms of big money's influence, with no limits to dollars involved, and no accountability for candidates those dollars are buying.
lead_paragraph: New and unlimited reserves of cash from so-called independent groups are bankrolling a constant stream of negative political ads.

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
